name: Average scores of students in grades 4 and 8 on the main NAEP mathematics assessment, by race or ethnicity and socioeconomic status: 2022
description: Average scores of students in grades 4 and 8 on the main NAEP mathematics assessment, by race or ethnicity and socioeconomic status: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: student_grade_and_race_or_ethnicity
variableMeasured.description: Student grade and race or ethnicity hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_eligible_for_free_or_reduced_price_lunch
variableMeasured.description: Eligible For Free Or Reduced Price Lunch

variableMeasured.name: field_not_eligible_for_free_or_reduced_price_lunch
variableMeasured.description: Not Eligible For Free Or Reduced Price Lunch

notes: The scale for NAEP mathematics assessment scores is 0–500 for grades 4 and 8. Black includes African American. Hispanic includes Latino. Hispanic may be any race; race categories exclude Hispanic origin.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, special tabulations (2022) of the 2022 main NAEP mathematics assessment, National Center for Education Statistics.Science and Engineering Indicators
